common.chooseCategoryToStartHint1: Choose category which will be wrestling at the table

hint.categoryContinueLater: Save current progress and start a new category. You can return to this category at any time.
hint.participant.checkedIn: Indicates that the athlete has appeared, completed weigh-in, and confirmed participation
hint.participant.registered: Athlete has registered but has not checked-in yet
hint.emptyState.noToutnaments: No tournaments have been created yet. Start by adding your first tournament.
hint.tournament.finish: You won’t be able to resume the tournament, but the current results will be saved.

message.athlete.checkedIn: Status updated: the athlete is now checked-in
error.tablesCount.change: Cannot lower the table count since matches are ongoing.
error.selectedCategory.change.noCompetit: This category is empty. Pick a different one or add athletes.
error.selectedCategory.inProgress.remove: You can’t delete a category once matches have started or finished.
warning.category.remove.confirmationModa: Are you sure you want to delete this category?
All athletes competing only in this category will be permanently removed.
warning.category.add.athletes: Cannot add athletes: matches in this category have already started or finished.
warning.category.delete.athletes: Cannot delete athlete: their categories are already in progress or finished.
warning.category.specific.delete.athlete: Cannot delete athlete: matches in this category have already started or finished.
warning.tournament.finish: Are you sure you want to end the tournament?
warning.tournament.unfinishedCategories: Warning! Some categories have not yet started or are still unfinished
warning.athletes.statusRequired: *Only checked-in athletes can compete in tournament brackets
text.winnerIsChosen: The winner has already been chosen.
categories.rulesExplanation: Tournament categories are formed based on the following principle: [classification] + [gender] + [weight] + [arm]
categories.emptyState: You haven’t added any categories yet. Create your first one to set up the tournament.

placeholder.tableNumber: How many tables will be used simultaneously during matches
